import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '../_services/auth.service'; import { User } from '../model'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-inscription', templateUrl: './inscription.component.html', styleUrls: ['./inscription.component.css'], }) export class InscriptionComponent { inscription: User = { name: '', email: '', password: '', }; error: any; constructor(private authService: AuthService, private router: Router) {} ngOnInit(): void {} onSubmit() { this.authService.inscription(this.inscription).subscribe({ next: (response) => { console.log(response); this.router.navigate(['/connexion']); }, error: (error: any) => { console.error("Une erreur s'est produite : ", error.error.error); this.error = error.error.error; }, }); } }
